body:
Yo so this isn't a new idea and for those of you who have played in a few OCN tournaments you'll probably be familiar with this.  (Original Thread/ idea  https://oc.tc/forums/topics/52c72d6f12ca958b62001ebf )

This thread wasn't very successful so i archived the old one and thought i would reboot it seeing as the tourney is actually underway now.
So basically it's a wager/bet or whatever you wanna call it. 

A team leader must enter their team literally by saying (e.g): IGN: BmB leader of Bad Company, we accept the bet. 

If you win the tournament you don't have to carry out the forfeit however to any team that lose, regardless of the position, and if they have entered they must perform a team singing. One team leader must participate in the song and if need be they can do it solo however it would be more entertaining if the entire team took part. 

Ok the song has been decided! Louis Armstrong - What a Wonderful World. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3yCcXgbKrE 
Get entering teams!

Teams entered: 

Bad Company
PieZ Solo.
Insidia 
Berzerkv2
